content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. As a landlord seeking the highest possible price for this apartment in Munich, I'll start with an initial offer of 1500 Euros per month. However, please feel free to propose a different rental price during our negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because starting with such a high price may not align with my budget goals.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
